title: Help with pollution of the realms : r/feedthebeast - Reddit
body: 10. r/feedthebeast. Join. • 19 days ago. The 1.20.2 update for the Neoforge Mod loader will include code changes that will require mods to be built against it, not Forge. What mod loader will you continue to use in 1.20.2? 27520a3f.websites-eob.pages.dev. 202.
readable_content:
Mettalpillow (2021-12-08): Help with pollution of the realms

Question

I Made a diamond vacuum bag and the iron vacuum tube but it only takes in sulfur and not the carbon, it says filters: under the name of the item, does that have anything to do with it and how can i get rid of the carbon?

anabsolutesloth (2021-12-08):
- Anvil the bag with the filter material for Carbon.

Mettalpillow (2021-12-08):
- Filter material for carbon?
